articles.description: Rebecca Black has become the darkened pop star brings us 'Let Her Burn' after 10 years of navigating the music world.
articles.content: Rebecca Black had an infamous start: for years, her name was attached to the ridiculed internet hit Friday, but there was always more to the story. The 2021 EP Rebecca Black Was Here was a ballsy rei… [+2239 chars]

articles.title: King Charles' Hole in His Sock Revealed After Royal Takes Off Shoes for Mosque Visit - Entertainment Tonight
articles.description: His Majesty paid a visit to a historic mosque on Brick Lane in east London.
articles.content:
King Charles went to one of the holiest places in all of east London and dug himself into a bit of a hole thanks to his socks.
